Title: 39243 - # Ways to Prep Your Home for a New Season
Direction: 500 words – Discuss 3-6 ways that a home owner can prep their home for a change in season. Include tips that would be useful in any seasonal change, such as from summer to fall and also from winter to spring. A few possible topics to explore are changing a home’s air conditioning filter, checking windows for wear and tear and assessing the outdoor siding. Also mention different DIY projects, such as simple home remodeling. Things like painting walls, changing out the knobs on cabinet doors, or projects like building outdoor furniture for summer BBQs out of pallet wood, etc. You also talk about decorating for the season, with colored throw pillows, rugs or flowers.  The article’s target audience is home owners who want to keep their home in great shape and also enjoy home DIY projects and home decor. Be sure to link to this blog post: http://www.theairworx.com/blog/why-its-so-important-to-change-your-hvacs-filter as your target URL. Do NOT link to the http://www.theairworx.com/ URL. You can place the target URL in the section where you talk about replacing air conditioning filters as a way to prep your home for a new season.
